newsitem.title: USA: T/SF explores possible sale of DAC unit.
newsitem.headline: T/SF explores possible sale of DAC unit.

text.p: T/SF Communications Corp said Tuesday it had engaged Prudential Securities Inc to help it explore strategic alternatives, including a possible sale of its Transportation Information Services Inc unit.
The unit operates under the tradename "DAC Services" and provides pre-employment and other information services to the trucking insurance, casino and convenience store industries, T/SF said.
T/SF, a business and information services company that produces trade journals, said its goal is to maximize the value of the unit "through a suitable transaction, either a sale or merger."
It said any deal is unlikely to be completed until mid-1997.
The DAC unit had revenues for the nine months ended September 30 of about $15.8 million, up from $13 million in the year-ago period, T/SF said.
